text: “Ndipo usazitong’olere maso ako (mozidololokera zinthu) zimene tawasangalatsa nazo ena mwa anthu pakati pawo; zimenezo nzokongoletsa za moyo wa pa dziko basi, kuti tiwayese mayeso pazimenezo; koma chopatsa cha Mbuye wako (chomwe nchololedwa ngakhale chikhale chochepa) nchabwino kwambiri ndiponso chokhalitsa
